org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group.chain

Interface DistributedStep<T,L,K,C,I,O extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of elements to be processed by worker.
    L - Local context.
    K - Type of keys of cache used for group training.
    C - Context used by worker.
    I - Type of input to this step.
    O - Type of output of this step.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistributedEntryProcessingStep<L,K,V,C,I,O>, DistributedKeyProcessingStep<L,K,C,I,O>

    public interface DistributedStep<T,L,K,C,I,O extends Serializable>
    Class encapsulating logic of distributed step in ComputationsChain.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Get supplier of keys for worker.
      IgniteFunction<List<O>,O> reducer()
      Get function used to reduce results returned by worker.
      IgniteSupplier<C> remoteContextSupplier(I input, L locCtx)
      Create supplier of context used by worker.
      IgniteFunction<T,ResultAndUpdates<O>> worker()
      Get function applied to each cache element specified by keys.
